text: “Nia damana ga hai baahi ang gi nadau dama daane, gei nia dama daane ang gi nadau damana. Nia dinana ga hai baahi ang gi nadau dama ahina, gei nia dama ahina ang gi nadau dinana. Nia dinana dau aga ga hai baahi ang gi nadau dama ahina dau aga, gei nia dama ahina dau aga ga hai baahi ang gi nadau dinana dau aga.”12.53 Micah 7.6
